input_text:
Job Title: Systems Support Manager

Location: Minooka, IL

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Distribution, Supply Chain

Description:
Accurate Personnel is looking to bring on a skilled Systems Support Manager to one of the top food distribution companies in the US located in Minooka, IL!  If you're skilled in ERP systems, EDI integration, and have logistics industry experience, apply now to be part of our successful team.
Salary: Starting at $85k a year, and based on experience!
Benefits: Affordable BCBS - PPO coverageAnnual Bonus: 10% - 12.5%, increasing to 20% - 30% after 5 yearsRoom for advancement: Opportunities in a rapidly expanding company.
Responsibilities:Manage daily operations of the systems support team.Provide technical expertise for ERP systems and oversee EDI integration.Collaborate with teams to align systems with business requirements.Troubleshoot and resolve system issues promptly.Stay updated on industry best practices and technologies.Develop and maintain system documentation.Conduct end-user training sessions.
Requirements:Experience as a Systems Support Manager in logistics.Proficiency in ERP systems and EDI integration.Leadership skills to mentor a team.Strong problem-solving and communication abilities.Detail-oriented with a focus on quality.Adaptability to a fast-paced environment.—--ABOUT ACCURATE PERSONNELDo you need your next job fast? Accurate Personnel is here to help! As an industry-leading full-service staffing agency, we have all the tools you need to start earning that next paycheck soon. Send us your application and our team will instantly get to work on finding you the right placement to fit your needs. Accurate Personnel has been a provider of temporary job services and direct hire search for 45 years. Our expertise has allowed us to grow from a regional Chicagoland office into a nationwide search firm that services over 500 clients while never losing sight of personalized service. Let Accurate work for you. Apply with us today!—--Accurate Personnel provides equal employment opportunities to all employees and applicants for employment and prohibits discrimination and harassment of any type without regard to race, color, religion, age, sex, national origin, disability status, genetics, protected veteran status, sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, or any other characteristic protected by federal, state or local laws.

Experience Level (if available): Mid-Senior level

Provide technical expertise for ERP systems and oversee EDI integration
Collaborate with teams to align systems with business requirements
Troubleshoot and resolve system issues promptly
Stay updated on industry best practices and technologies
